text: Kachi Koli is an Indo-Aryan language spoken in Sindh, Pakistan as well as a smaller community in Gujarat, India. Many of the Kachi Koli speakers have now migrated to Malawi and they are Hindu.https://www.peoplegroups.org/Explore/GroupDetails.aspx?peid=15325 == References == Category:Languages of Sindh Category:Languages of India Category:Indo-Aryan languages
title: Kachi Koli language
